articles.title: How to see the moon in conjunction with 5 planets this month - Livescience.com
articles.description: In early July, our natural satellite will appear close to Mars, Saturn, Jupiter, Venus and Mercury.
articles.content:
In early July, the moon will pass close to all three of Earth's neighboring  inner solar system planets, plus the two largest planets that orbit the sun.
